item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Saturday, March 8, 2025 at 3:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Feds Link $150M Cyberheist to 2022 LastPass Hacks (97 points | 52 comments)
2. Polars Cloud: The Distributed Cloud Architecture to Run Polars Anywhere (162 points | 54 comments)
3. Mountains, Cliffs, and Caves: A Guide to Using Perlin Noise for Procedural Gen (29 points | 4 comments)
4. How did places like Bell Labs know how to ask the right questions? (2023) (42 points | 23 comments)
5. Portable MRI Scans Patients for Signs of Stroke (11 points | 4 comments)
6. Introducing command And commandfor In HTML (272 points | 159 comments)
7. Vtm: Text-Based Desktop Environment (199 points | 43 comments)
8. Show HN: Open-Source DocumentAI with Ollama (4 points | discuss)
9. The features of Python's help() function (80 points | 32 comments)
10. Optimistic Locking in B-Trees (112 points | 25 comments)
11. GeoCities in 1995: Building a Home Page on the Internet (68 points | 32 comments)
12. Rust inadequate for text compression codecs? (56 points | 34 comments)
13. Integrated sensing and communication based on space-time-coding metasurfaces (19 points | 1 comment)
14. Ladder: Self-improving LLMs through recursive problem decomposition (335 points | 103 comments)
15. Athena spacecraft declared dead after toppling over on moon (180 points | 239 comments)
16. Developer sabotaged ex-employer with kill switch that activated when fired (31 points | 13 comments)
17. Age Verification Laws: A Backdoor to Surveillance (337 points | 238 comments)
18. ParadeDB (YC S23) Is Hiring a Rust Database Engineer ( | hide)
19. Strobelight: A profiling service built on open source technology (137 points | 43 comments)
20. Unleashed Recompiled: PC port of the Xbox 360 version of Sonic Unleashed (49 points | 10 comments)
21. Ask HN: Do your eyes bug you even though your prescription is "correct"? (144 points | 162 comments)
22. A game of learning your homelab into a cyberpunk mystery adventure (3 points | 2 comments)
23. Microsoft is plotting a future without OpenAI (322 points | 308 comments)
24. 'Next-Level' Chaos Traces the True Limit of Predictability (28 points | 6 comments)
25. Letta: Letta is a framework for creating LLM services with memory (10 points | discuss)
26. Show HN: I Built a Telegraph Simulator (41 points | 17 comments)
27. Take It Down Act: A Flawed Attempt to Protect Victims That'll Lead to Censorship (10 points | 2 comments)
28. Superintelligence startup Reflection AI launches with $130M in funding (17 points | 6 comments)
29. Europe's most wanted man plotted my murder and that of my colleague (266 points | 110 comments)
30. Differentiable Logic Cellular Automata (428 points | 84 comments)
